attributes.review:
I wanted to get the fruit slicing game. The one that slices oranges and other fruits. I was looking threw the apps and I found this app. It looked like the fruit slicing app so I got it. I was so excited to open my app and slice all the fruits. Then, when I opened my app it was a picture of a orange and I was so happy that I found the app. Then, it wanted my phone number and I was confused. So I looked at the terms and stuff. After I was looking threw it for a while I learned that Donald Trump operates the app. I am not happy that my president was on a fruit slicing app. If any of you have any recommendations of fruit slicing apps I am more than happy to try them out.

Sincerely, Dory
attributes.title: Fruit slicing game
